normalised: Okay, koni tori differential calculus shikonk sodtalem, bare? Tem dista titlem bhayanak nÃ£i, bhai! Tem ashem chint: tum tujem Bajaj scooter cholaitÃ£i, ani tuji speed kiteak bodolta tem tuka zanno zÃ£i. Tem differential calculus-achem ek muhurt rup â€“ tatkalik bodlantachi gati sodunk. unnormalised: Magir tum more complex functions ani rules-anche kodden vetÄi, chain rule sarkho. MÄjyea-cher visvÄs dovrunkÄ, composite functions deal kortannÄ chain rule tujo best friend mhunn bhÄvun ghe. Udaharonnak, d/dx (sin(x^3)) chain rule-achi garaz asa. Ani tum derivativanchi application maxima & minima calculations-anchekhatir zannonk zai. Hea-nt real-world application type problemyanchi goddsan ÄsÄt, zoxem box-ak volume vaddo-unk optimal dimensions sodunk.
normalised: Magir tum adhik jattil functions ani niyamanche koden vetoloi, zoxem chain rule. Mhaka visvas di, chain rule tujho best friend zatat jeva tum composite functions-anche koden deal kortoloi. Udahornak, d divided by d x of sine of x cubed chain rule zai. Toxench, derivatives-anche application maxima ani minima calculations khatir tumka somzunk poddtat. Hantunt khup real-world application type problems asatat, udahornak, volume vaddo korunk ek box-achem optimal dimensions sodunk.

unnormalised: Ekda tum theory-cher comfortable zÄtÄi, practice, practice, practice! Tuje NCERT textbook-antle problemy solve kor, magir RD Sharma sarkhe tougher kitei-cher move kor. unnormalised: Ani differentiation undo korunk integration visrunkÄ naka. Mhunnllear, differentiation slope sodlea sarke zÄtÄ, integration mhunnllear curve-achea tala-ntli area sodunk.
